list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Refactor: Migrate Home screen to BLoC and remove state_extended
- Replaced the `state_extended` package with `flutter_bloc` for state management in the Home screen. - Converted `HomeController` into `HomeBloc` to handle business logic, including fetching statistics and expenses. - Refactored `HomeScreen` from a `StatefulWidget` into a `StatelessWidget` that consumes the `HomeBloc`. - Deleted the now-unused screen layout files (`l_home_screen.dart`, `m_home_screen.dart`, `s_home_screen.dart`). - Moved Home-related models and data handlers into a dedicated `Home/Model` directory. - Introduced `CardWidget` as a shared widget for the dashboard. - Fixed a typo in the `auth_controller.dart` by renaming `togglePasswordVisability` to `togglePasswordVisibility`. - Updated dependencies including `get_it`, `shared_preferences`, and `syncfusion_flutter_charts`. - Set the default application language to Arabic.

task.summary:
refactor: use ValueNotifier for sidebar state
- Replaced `setState` with `ValueNotifier` and `AnimatedBuilder` for managing the sidebar's expanded state. - This improves performance by rebuilding only the necessary widgets when the state changes. - Mixed in `SingleTickerProviderStateMixin` to support the animation. - Removed commented-out theme property and added a TODO for state management.

Refactor: Migrate state management to Bloc and implement Repository pattern
- Migrated `ThemeProvider`, `LanguageProvider`, and `NetworkCheckerNotifier` from `ChangeNotifier` to `Cubit`. - Replaced `CategoriesController` with `CategoriesBloc`, defining `CategoriesEvents` and `CategoriesState` for predictable state management. - Introduced `MainLayoutCubit` to handle sidebar expansion and navigation state, converting `MainLayout` to a `StatelessWidget`. - Implemented the Repository pattern for Categories, splitting logic into `CategoriesRepository`, `CategoriesLocalDataSource`, and `CategoriesRemoteDataSource`. - Renamed `color_pallete.dart` to `color_pallet.dart` and corrected typos (`watingColor` to `waitingColor`, `defultTheme` to `defaultTheme`). - Updated `DropdownModel` to extend `Equatable` and added `const` constructors. - Added `flutter_bloc` and `equatable` dependencies and updated `main.dart` initialization to use `MultiBlocProvider`.

Refactor: Migrate Home screen to BLoC and remove state_extended
- Replaced the `state_extended` package with `flutter_bloc` for state management in the Home screen. - Converted `HomeController` into `HomeBloc` to handle business logic, including fetching statistics and expenses. - Refactored `HomeScreen` from a `StatefulWidget` into a `StatelessWidget` that consumes the `HomeBloc`. - Deleted the now-unused screen layout files (`l_home_screen.dart`, `m_home_screen.dart`, `s_home_screen.dart`). - Moved Home-related models and data handlers into a dedicated `Home/Model` directory. - Introduced `CardWidget` as a shared widget for the dashboard. - Fixed a typo in the `auth_controller.dart` by renaming `togglePasswordVisability` to `togglePasswordVisibility`. - Updated dependencies including `get_it`, `shared_preferences`, and `syncfusion_flutter_charts`. - Set the default application language to Arabic.

MESSAGE.value:
refactor: use ValueNotifier for sidebar state
- Replaced `setState` with `ValueNotifier` and `AnimatedBuilder` for managing the sidebar's expanded state. - This improves performance by rebuilding only the necessary widgets when the state changes. - Mixed in `SingleTickerProviderStateMixin` to support the animation. - Removed commented-out theme property and added a TODO for state management.

Refactor: Migrate state management to Bloc and implement Repository pattern
- Migrated `ThemeProvider`, `LanguageProvider`, and `NetworkCheckerNotifier` from `ChangeNotifier` to `Cubit`. - Replaced `CategoriesController` with `CategoriesBloc`, defining `CategoriesEvents` and `CategoriesState` for predictable state management. - Introduced `MainLayoutCubit` to handle sidebar expansion and navigation state, converting `MainLayout` to a `StatelessWidget`. - Implemented the Repository pattern for Categories, splitting logic into `CategoriesRepository`, `CategoriesLocalDataSource`, and `CategoriesRemoteDataSource`. - Renamed `color_pallete.dart` to `color_pallet.dart` and corrected typos (`watingColor` to `waitingColor`, `defultTheme` to `defaultTheme`). - Updated `DropdownModel` to extend `Equatable` and added `const` constructors. - Added `flutter_bloc` and `equatable` dependencies and updated `main.dart` initialization to use `MultiBlocProvider`.

Refactor: Migrate Home screen to BLoC and remove state_extended
- Replaced the `state_extended` package with `flutter_bloc` for state management in the Home screen. - Converted `HomeController` into `HomeBloc` to handle business logic, including fetching statistics and expenses. - Refactored `HomeScreen` from a `StatefulWidget` into a `StatelessWidget` that consumes the `HomeBloc`. - Deleted the now-unused screen layout files (`l_home_screen.dart`, `m_home_screen.dart`, `s_home_screen.dart`). - Moved Home-related models and data handlers into a dedicated `Home/Model` directory. - Introduced `CardWidget` as a shared widget for the dashboard. - Fixed a typo in the `auth_controller.dart` by renaming `togglePasswordVisability` to `togglePasswordVisibility`. - Updated dependencies including `get_it`, `shared_preferences`, and `syncfusion_flutter_charts`. - Set the default application language to Arabic.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value:
Refactor: Migrate Home screen to BLoC and remove state_extended
- Replaced the `state_extended` package with `flutter_bloc` for state management in the Home screen. - Converted `HomeController` into `HomeBloc` to handle business logic, including fetching statistics and expenses. - Refactored `HomeScreen` from a `StatefulWidget` into a `StatelessWidget` that consumes the `HomeBloc`. - Deleted the now-unused screen layout files (`l_home_screen.dart`, `m_home_screen.dart`, `s_home_screen.dart`). - Moved Home-related models and data handlers into a dedicated `Home/Model` directory. - Introduced `CardWidget` as a shared widget for the dashboard. - Fixed a typo in the `auth_controller.dart` by renaming `togglePasswordVisability` to `togglePasswordVisibility`. - Updated dependencies including `get_it`, `shared_preferences`, and `syncfusion_flutter_charts`. - Set the default application language to Arabic.
